title: Deliver us to Dublin...With Care
description: The final instalment of Summer Flings – a fun, flirty and laugh out loud rom com series of short stories.Miserable, lonely and broken hearted, Ciara returns to Dublin on a mission to sort out her life. A job is at the top of the list but a visit to the doctor has surprising repercussions.She refuses to drift apart from her friends now that real life has begun, struggles to fit new relationships into her life and still has to deal with everything else fate throws her way.But even Ciara should know that there’s always something a little bit special to be found at the end of the rainbow…The ideal summer treat for those relaxing days soaking up the sun!
author: Aimee Duffy
